scripts.say: Ahahah, how does it feel to be forced into a fight with us?
Allow me to remind you: while I'm sure you were hoping to dock at a neutral port, there are Royal Navy freighters here.
How unfortunate. All you had to do was choose another port, then you would have put us in a tight spot...
I'm surprised you planned this far ahead... But I wonder: why are you so confident that you can defeat me?
WE don't plan on defeating you. A half dozen more capable people are on their way here to do that... like Ark Royal, or Renown, just to name a few.
In short: all that we had to do was to slow you down.
...I see. What a flawless plan you've devised...
Though, because you've been so gracious and allowed all the merchant ship crews to escape, we'll let you live if you surrender now. I swear it on the honour of the Royal Navy.

...If you think I'll go down by your hands just as you'd hoped, know I won't let you do that... There is no reason for me to harm you... or any of the innocent people at this port, simply to entertain an impossible fight...
